name: Cultivate The Rainbow
description:
Thanks to your lean green time travel machine, you’re out of fuel and stuck in the land before time. As you are well aware, TIME MACHINES run on RAINBOWS. And, as everyone knows, rainbows are made from VEGETABLES. With an extinction event on the horizon, your mission is to plant and pick as many vegetables as you can to fuel your escape before the meteor hits.

Full game lasts around 15 minutes.

Cultivate The Rainbow has been developed for Rainbow Jam 2017. It is at an early stage of development. The game has music, but is currently without sound effects. This is something we’re working on. If we actually had a time machine, it’d have the sound effects by now!

We are developing a prehistoric farming game with a similar premise. We created ‘Cultivate The Rainbow’ with the aim of testing some of the mechanics.

We’d love to hear what you’d like from a prehistoric farming game.
